creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
medium: Ink and color on gold-flecked paper
signed: artist's signature and seal, at URC
text: The tall, dramatic mountains and pine trees rendered here by Zou Zhilin create the perfect secluded setting for a scholar wishing to retreat from society. The inscribed poem adds to the scene’s evocativeness: The cold water in the pool gives birth to the moon The wind blowing among pine trees in the night is reminiscent of autumn Painted in the fifth moon in the summer of 1647.
title: Scholar's Mountain Retreat Amongst the Pines
